snippet: The photographer Gus Powell’s “The Lonely Ones,” an homage to the cartoonist William Steig, pairs poignant photos with subtle, funny one-liners.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Gus Powell’s “The Lonely Ones,” an homage to the cartoonist William Steig, pairs poignant photos with subtle, funny one-liners.

headline.main: An Inventively Designed Photo Book (That You Can Read)
